00031 SetupNavigator::SetupNavigator() {
00032 
00033   fSQLiteFilename="sqlite://pedestals-and-noises.sqlite";
00034   fServer = new TSQLiteServer(fSQLiteFilename.c_str());
00035 
00036   if (fServer->IsZombie()) {
00037     std::cout << "SetupNavigator: ERROR: Couldn't connect to SQLite database." << std::endl;
00038     throw Except::NoCalibDB();
00039   }
00040 }
00041 
00042 SetupNavigator::~SetupNavigator() {
00043 
00044   fServer->Close();
00045 
00046   if (fThis) 
00047     delete fThis;
00048 }

00050 std::string SetupNavigator::GetBank(const IDs::channel& src)const{
00051     TSetupData* setup=TSetupData::Instance();
00052     std::map<std::string, std::string>* bankDetNameMap=&setup->fBankToDetectorMap;
00053     for(std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator it = bankDetNameMap->begin();
00054             it != bankDetNameMap->end(); ++it){
00055         if(modules::parser::iequals(it->second , src.str())) return it->first;
00056     }
00057     return "invalid-det-bank";
00058 }
00059 
00060 void SetupNavigator::CacheCalibDB() {
00061   // Cache all the variables we have in the database
00062   // First the pedestals and noises
00063   fTableName = "pedestals_and_noises";
00064   if (!fServer->HasTable(fTableName.c_str())) { // check it exists
00065     std::cout << "SetupNavigator: ERROR: Table " << fTableName << " does not exist." << std::endl;
00066   }
00067   else {
00068     if (fPedestalValues.empty() && fNoiseValues.empty()) {
00069       ReadPedestalAndNoiseValues();
00070     }
00071   }
00072 }
00073 
00074 void SetupNavigator::ReadPedestalAndNoiseValues() {
00075   // The values that we will read in
00076   double pedestal=definitions::DefaultValue;
00077   double noise=definitions::DefaultValue;
00078   std::string channelname;
00079  
00080   std::stringstream query;
00081   int run_number = GetRunNumber(); // get this run number (Note that if we don't have a catalogue of pedestals and noises for each run then we will want to change this)
00082 
00083   query << "SELECT * FROM " << fTableName << " WHERE run=" << run_number << ";"; // get all the pedestals and noises
00084   TSQLiteResult* result = (TSQLiteResult*) fServer->Query(query.str().c_str());  // get the result of this query
00085   query.str(""); // clear the stringstream after use
00086   
00087   TSQLiteRow* row = (TSQLiteRow*) result->Next(); // get the first row
00088   while (row != NULL) {
00089     channelname = row->GetField(1);
00090     pedestal = atof(row->GetField(3));
00091     noise = atof(row->GetField(4));
00092     
00093     fPedestalValues[channelname] = pedestal;
00094     fNoiseValues[channelname] = noise;
00095     delete row;
00096     row = (TSQLiteRow*) result->Next(); // get the next row
00097   }
00098   delete result; // user has to delete the result
00099 
00100 }
